medical_history.chief_complaint: LLQ abdominal pain that awoke her from sleep.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started at 3 AM with lower left quadrant abdominal pain. The pain grew progressively worse throughout the morning, with the patient rating the current pain after receiving morphine. The pain was initially constant but is now reported as coming in waves. There was a bowel movement noted with a small amount of dark blood. A subjective fever was noted, but no chills were present. The patient denies any prior episodes of similar abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: External hemorrhoids; last colonoscopy noted sigmoid diverticuli.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died of pancreatic cancer; Father died of lung cancer; Brother died of testicular cancer.
